@graph.caption: Our Vegan Samoa Cookie Overnight Oats in glass jars

@graph.name: Samoa Cookie Overnight Oats - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: These Vegan Samoa Cookie Overnight Oats are dessert for breakfast Layers of salted date caramel, Toasted coconut, melted chocolate! Glutenfree Nutfree Soyfree Recipe

@graph.name: Samoa Cookie Overnight Oats
@graph.description: These Vegan Samoa Cookie Overnight Oats are dessert for breakfast with layers of salted caramel made with dates, Toasted coconut, melted chocolate! Caramel delight Oats. Add berries and fruits of choice. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Soyfree Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup old fashioned rolled oats (, gluten free if necessary, or use other grain flakes)
2  drops of almond extract or vanilla extract (optional)
2 tbsp toasted shredded coconut (toast over medium low for a few mins)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in 1/2 cup hot water for 15 mins if you havent already. Then Blend with the soaking water and salt until smooth and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the dates in 1/2 cup hot water for 15 mins if you havent already. Then Blend with the soaking water and salt until smooth and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oats, chia, chocolate chips and non dairy milk to a bowl. Add  3 tbsp date caramel, a pinch of salt. Add almond extract or vanilla extract (optional). I like almond here.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oats, chia, chocolate chips and non dairy milk to a bowl. Add  3 tbsp date caramel, a pinch of salt. Add almond extract or vanilla extract (optional). I like almond here.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything and press the oats in so that all oats are soaked. Chill for 10 mins. Transfer to jars. Alternatively, you can mix everything in 1 mason jar.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything and press the oats in so that all oats are soaked. Chill for 10 mins. Transfer to jars. Alternatively, you can mix everything in 1 mason jar.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with some date caramel or swirl it in. Then top generously with toasted coconut.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with some date caramel or swirl it in. Then top generously with toasted coconut.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate chips with the non dairy milk over a double boiler or in microwave. Drizzle over the coconut. You can drizzle the chocolate lightly or pour some in for a thin ganache like layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the chocolate chips with the non dairy milk over a double boiler or in microwave. Drizzle over the coconut. You can drizzle the chocolate lightly or pour some in for a thin ganache like layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Seal and refrigerate overnight. Warm lightly if needed, before serving. Add berries and sliced fruits of choice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Seal and refrigerate overnight. Warm lightly if needed, before serving. Add berries and sliced fruits of choice and serve.
